name: Rum and Coconut Water
description: This drink requires the simplest of preparations, yet it's almost wholly unexpected by the average imbiber. For assertiveness, it uses a good, amber rum—Appleton Extra is a good choice, as are Angostura 1919 and Bacardi 8— and for unparalleled refreshment impact, chilled coconut water.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum, top with coconut water. Insert straw. Relax.
